issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: CloudFormation VPC stack creation fails on NetworkAclEntry with empty Icmp/Code property

comments.body: Issue is due to how blanks are handled.  Before "" would fail an integer parsing, but now it will be considered null for non-required fields (int/double) and error if required, saying the field can't be blank.
